bibl.title: Graeco-Egyptian Religion and Roman Policy on a Coin of Alexandria.
San. Journal of the Society for Ancient Numismatics

bibl.note: The depicted gods promote Roman policy and indicate approval of the Emperor's deeds in Egypt. - Non vidimus. Cf. NL 125 (1991) p. 23, No. 137.
BEAUCHAINE L.E., Graeco-Egyptian Religion and Roman Policy on a Coin of Alexandria.
San. Journal of the Society for Ancient Numismatics 18, No. 1 (July 1990) pp. 4-7, ill.
